CustomField.description: If set to TRUE, a reminder will be sent for this Timesheet during the next scheduled batch run.
CustomField.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(tc9_et__Approval_Status__c, 'New'), tc9_et__End_Date__c < Today(), tc9_et__Exclude_From_Employee_Reminder_List__c != TRUE, OR( DATEVALUE(tc9_et__Last_Employee_Reminder_Sent__c) != Today(), ISBLANK(DATEVALUE((tc9_et__Last_Employee_Reminder_Sent__c))) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set to TRUE, a reminder will be sent for this Timesheet during the next scheduled batch run.
CustomField.label: Employee TS Reminder
